list-item.p: Mild ARDS: 200 mmHg < PaO 2/FiO 2 ≤ 300 mmHg (with PEEP or CPAP ≥5 cmH 2O, or non-ventilated)
Moderate ARDS: 100 mmHg < PaO 2/FiO 2 ≤200 mmHg with PEEP ≥5 cmH 2O, or non-ventilated)
Severe ARDS: PaO 2/FiO 2 ≤ 100 mmHg with PEEP ≥5 cmH2O, or non-ventilated)
When PaO 2 is not available, SpO 2/FiO 2 ≤315 suggests ARDS (including in nonventilated patients)
